title: Define Quantum Algorithm for Climate Simulation
description: Research and develop quantum algorithms suitable for ultra-high-resolution climate modeling.

title: Design Quantum Circuit for Climate Model
description: Develop the architecture and design of the quantum circuit to implement the chosen algorithm.
dependencies: Define Quantum Algorithm for Climate Simulation

title: Develop Quantum Computing Hardware Interface
description: Create an interface between the quantum computing hardware and the developed algorithms.
dependencies: Define Quantum Algorithm for Climate Simulation

title: Implement Data Processing and Preparation Modules
description: Create modules for pre-processing climate data and preparing it for input into the quantum algorithms.
dependencies: Design Quantum Circuit for Climate Model

title: Create User Interface for Climate Model
description: Develop a user-friendly interface for scientists and researchers to interact with the quantum climate model.
